resources.string: We will help find recommendations for your car.\n\nEnter the car brand:

This application was created to make it easier for users who are looking for car recommendations. The application will display several relevant car recommendations based on the brand and type of car (manual or automatic) entered by the user.

Copyright Â© 2024 Giyats Almanfalutti.
All rights reserved.

1. Toyota Avanza
The Toyota Avanza is a 7-seater MPV (Multi-Purpose Vehicle) car which is famous for its affordable price, fuel economy and spacious cabin. This car is suitable for families who want to have a car at an affordable price, able to accommodate many passengers, and comfortable for long trips.
Specifications:
Engine: 1.3L 4 cylinder and 1.5L 4 cylinder
Power: 98 PS (1.3L) and 106 PS (1.5L)
Torque: 12.4 Nm (1.3L) and 14.1 Nm (1.5L)
Transmission: 5-speed manual and CVT automatic
Fuel consumption: 13-15 km/liter (in the city) and 16-18 km / liter (outside the city)
Features: AC, power window, power steering, audio system, ABS, airbag, electronic parking brake

 2. Toyota Kijang Innova
The Toyota Kijang Innova is an MPV (Multi-Purpose Vehicle) 7 -seater which is famous for its elegant design, reliable performance and comfortable interior. This car is suitable for families who want to have a car with a stylish design, strong performance and a spacious cabin.
Specifications:
Engine: 2.0L 4 cylinder and 2.4L 4 cylinder
Power: 139 PS (2.0L) and 149 PS (2.4L)
Torque: 183 Nm (2.0L) and 239 Nm (2.4L)
Transmission: 5-speed manual and 6-speed automatic
Fuel consumption: 10-12 km/liter (in the city) and 13-15 km/liter (outside the city)
Features: AC, power windows, power steering, audio system, ABS, airbags, electronic parking brake, hill start assist, panoramic sunroof

 3. Toyota Fortuner
Toyota Fortuner is an SUV ( Sport Utility Vehicle) 7-seater which is famous for its dashing design, reliable performance and complete features. This car is suitable for families who want to have a car with a stylish design, strong performance and sophisticated features.
Specifications:
Engine: 2.4L 4 cylinder and 2.8L 4 cylinder
Power: 149 PS (2.4L) and 204 PS (2.8L)
Torque: 400 Nm (2.4L) and 420 Nm (2.8L)
Transmission: 6-speed manual and 6-speed automatic
Fuel consumption: 9-11 km/liter (in city) and 12-14 km/liter (outside the city)
Features: AC, power windows, power steering, audio system, ABS, airbags, electronic parking brake, hill start assist, adaptive cruise control, lane departure warning, forward collision warning

1. Toyota Corolla
The Toyota Corolla is a sedan that is famous for its elegant design, reliable performance and comfortable interior. This car is suitable for families who want to have a car with a stylish design, strong performance and a spacious cabin.
Specifications:
Engine: 1.8L 4 cylinder
Power: 140 PS
Torque: 171 Nm
Transmission: 6-speed manual or Automatic CVT
Fuel consumption: 12-14 km/liter (in city) and 15-17 km/liter (outside city)
Features: AC, power windows, power steering, audio system, ABS, airbags, electronic parking brake, hill start assist

 2. Toyota Yaris
The Toyota Yaris is a hatchback car that is famous for its sporty design, reliable performance and complete features. This car is suitable for drivers who want to have a car with a contemporary design, strong performance and sophisticated features.
Specifications:
Engine: 1.5L 4 cylinder
Power: 107 PS
Torque: 140 Nm
Transmission: 5-speed manual or Automatic CVT
Fuel consumption: 13-15 km/liter (in city) and 16-18 km/liter (outside city)
Features: AC, power window, power steering, audio system, ABS, airbag, electronic parking brake, hill start assist, paddle shift

 3. Toyota Rush
Toyota Rush is a 7-seater SUV (Sport Utility Vehicle) which is famous for its sporty design, reliable performance and spacious cabin. This car is suitable for families who want to have a car with a stylish design, strong performance, and a cabin that can accommodate many passengers. 
Specifications:
Engine: 1.5L 4 cylinder
Power: 104 PS
Torque: 138 Nm
Transmission: Manual 5-speed or 4-speed automatic
Fuel consumption: 10-12 km/liter (in the city) and 13-15 km/liter (outside the city)
Features: AC, power windows, power steering, audio system, ABS, airbags , electronic parking brake, hill start assist

1. Daihatsu Ayla Type D AT
Daihatsu Ayla Type D AT is a 5-seater LCGC (Low Cost Green Car) car which is famous for its low price, fuel economy and automatic transmission which makes it easier for drivers. This car is suitable for drivers who want to have a car that is affordable, easy to drive and comfortable on busy roads.
Specifications:
Engine: 1.0L 3 cylinder
Power: 65 PS
Torque: 86 Nm
Transmission: 4-speed automatic
 nFuel consumption: 14-16 km/liter (in city) and 17-19 km/liter (outside city)
Features: AC, power windows, power steering, audio system, ABS, airbags

 2. Daihatsu Sigra
Daihatsu Sigra is a 7-seater MPV (Multi-Purpose Vehicle) car which is famous for its affordable price, fuel economy and spacious cabin. This car is suitable for families who want to have a car at an affordable price, able to accommodate many passengers, and comfortable for long trips.
Specifications:
Engine: 1.0L 3 cylinders (D and M) / 1.2L 4 cylinders (X and R)\ nPower: 67 PS (1.0L) / 88 PS (1.2L)
Torque: 89 Nm (1.0L) / 108 Nm (1.2L)
Transmission: 5-speed manual or 4-speed automatic
Fuel consumption: 13-15 km/liter (in city) and 16-18 km/liter (outside city)
Features: AC, power window, power steering, audio system, ABS, airbag

 3. Daihatsu Rocky
Daihatsu Rocky is an SUV ( Sport Utility Vehicle) 5-seater which is famous for its stylish design, reliable performance and complete features. This car is suitable for drivers who want to have a car with a contemporary design, strong performance and sophisticated features.
Specifications:
Engine: 1.0L 3 cylinder Turbo (1.0R) / 1.2L 4 cylinder (1.2R)
Power: 98 PS (1.0L) / 88 PS (1.2L)
Torque: 140 Nm (1.0L) / 113 Nm (1.2L)
Transmission: 5-speed manual or CVT automatic
Fuel consumption: 16-18 km/liter (in city) and 19-21 km/liter (outside the city)
Features: AC, power windows, power steering, audio system, ABS, airbags, electronic parking brake, hill start assist, adaptive cruise control, lane departure warning, forward collision warning

1. Daihatsu Xenia
Daihatsu This car is suitable for families who want to have a car with a spacious and comfortable cabin.
Specifications:
Engine: 1.3L 4 cylinder
Power: 97 PS
Torque: 120 Nm
Transmission: 5-speed manual or 4-speed automatic
Consumption Fuel: 13-15 km/liter (in city) and 16-18 km/liter (outside city)
Features: AC, power window, power steering, audio system, ABS, airbag

 2. Daihatsu Terios
Daihatsu Terios is a 7-seater SUV (Sport Utility Vehicle) which has a sporty and tough design. This car is suitable for families who want to have a car with reliable performance and is able to overcome various road conditions.
Specifications:
Engine: 1.5L 4 cylinder
Power: 103 PS
Torque: 136 Nm
Transmission: 5-speed manual or 4-speed automatic -acceleration
Fuel consumption: 10-12 km/liter (in the city) and 13-15 km/liter (outside the city)
Features: AC, power windows, power steering, audio system, ABS, airbags, electronic parking brake, hill start assist

 3. Daihatsu Ayla Type D MT
Daihatsu Ayla Type D MT is a 5-seater LCGC (Low Cost Green Car) car which is famous for its low price and fuel economy. This car is suitable for drivers who want to have a car at an affordable price and easy to drive.
Specifications:
Engine: 1.0L 3 cylinder
Power: 65 PS
Torque: 86 Nm
Transmission: 5-speed manual
Fuel consumption: 15-17 km/liter (in city) and 18-20 km/liter (outside city)
Features: AC, power window, power steering, audio system
